plugins.tagline: Export text and color styles and color variables from Figma and import into Framer.

129256.tagline: Export text and color styles and color variables from Figma and import into Framer.

plugins.name: Replacer
plugins.description:
You select the object / component in figma and run this plugin.

For color groups: It automatically scans for "groups" and will do it's best to replace it with color variables that share the same naming structure.

For color variables, or plain colors: You select the color / variable to be replaced (target) and select the color to replace it with (source).

Done.

☑ Panel will remember what function you used last time.

☑ Works with gradient stops, colors in text fields and drop/inner shadows.
plugins.tagline: Replaces colors based on their "group" or per link to a color variable.

127834.name: Replacer
127834.description:
You select the object / component in figma and run this plugin.

For color groups: It automatically scans for "groups" and will do it's best to replace it with color variables that share the same naming structure.

For color variables, or plain colors: You select the color / variable to be replaced (target) and select the color to replace it with (source).

Done.

☑ Panel will remember what function you used last time.

☑ Works with gradient stops, colors in text fields and drop/inner shadows.
127834.release_notes: Added a "Delete" button to remove selected styles
127834.tagline: Replaces colors based on their "group" or per link to a color variable.

plugins.description: ED rzuty is a powerful Figma plugin that helps architects and designers organize and manage architectural drawings. This tool automatically transfers elements to designated groups, saving time and ensuring consistent organization across your projects. Perfect for managing floor plans, elevations, and section views
plugins.tagline: Efficient element organization for architectural drawings

plugins.name: Heavy Page Organizer
plugins.description:
Heavy Frame Organizer is a Figma plugin that helps you quickly organize components and sections on your canvas. With customizable spacing options, the plugin automatically arranges your main component at the top left, and positions related sub-components vertically below it. Sections are moved to the right of the main component, with spacing between each element based on user-defined settings. This tool helps streamline the organization of complex design files and improves your workflow efficiency.


Important:

The plugin only works while listening to Meshuggah
plugins.tagline: A very heavy Figma plugin for organizing pages.

127297.name: Heavy Page Organizer
127297.description:
Heavy Frame Organizer is a Figma plugin that helps you quickly organize components and sections on your canvas. With customizable spacing options, the plugin automatically arranges your main component at the top left, and positions related sub-components vertically below it. Sections are moved to the right of the main component, with spacing between each element based on user-defined settings. This tool helps streamline the organization of complex design files and improves your workflow efficiency.


Important:

The plugin only works while listening to Meshuggah
127297.release_notes:
New Features:
➕ Multi-column layout support: You can now organize multiple main components into their own columns.
📎 Sub-component alignment: Sub-components that begin with .[Main Component Name] are automatically grouped and aligned beneath their respective main components.
📄 Section column: Sections are now placed in their own vertical column to the far right.

UX Improvements:
🎯 Autofocus on first input for faster, smoother use.
⌨️ Return key support – press Enter to trigger the “Apply” action without needing to click.
127297.tagline: A very heavy Figma plugin for organizing pages.

plugins.name: Round Off
plugins.description:
This plugin helps avoid the Figma export bug where any decimal values in a frame's position values are are rounded up on export, resulting in a subpixel white line on the sides of your exported PNGs.


Apply to all top-level frames or to just to frames selected and remove all decimal values from the x and y positions before export.


Never see that white line again!
plugins.tagline: Avoid PNG export bugs by rounding off all decimals from your top level frames' position values.

130230.name: Round Off
130230.description:
This plugin helps avoid the Figma export bug where any decimal values in a frame's position values are are rounded up on export, resulting in a subpixel white line on the sides of your exported PNGs.


Apply to all top-level frames or to just to frames selected and remove all decimal values from the x and y positions before export.


Never see that white line again!
130230.tagline: Avoid PNG export bugs by rounding off all decimals from your top level frames' position values.

plugins.name: Holy Shade
plugins.description:
Holy Shade - A Color Matching Challenge! 🎨


Test your color perception skills with Holy Shade, a fun and engaging game designed for designers, artists, and color enthusiasts! 🖌️


🔍 How to Play:


A target color is displayed at the top.


Choose the matching shade from the options below.


The closer your choice, the higher your score!


💡 Why Play?


Improve your color differentiation skills.


Sharpen your ability to recognize subtle shade variations.


Challenge yourself and compete for the highest score!


Are you ready to master the art of color perception? 🌈✨
plugins.tagline: A Color Matching Challenge!

plugins.name: Interflow Connect
plugins.description:
Transform your design-to-management workflow with Interflow Connect, the Figma plugin that brings your UI flows directly into the Interflow. Designed for product teams and designers who demand efficiency, Interflow Connect eliminates the tedious process of manual uploads, allowing you to focus on what truly matters—creating exceptional user interfaces.


Streamlined Workflow, Unmatched Efficiency


With Interflow Connect, transferring your designs from Figma to Interflow is as simple as a few clicks. Select your desired frames within Figma, assign or create the appropriate flow and section names, and upload your screens directly to the Interflow without ever leaving your design environment. This seamless integration ensures your UI flows are always up-to-date and easily accessible for audits and reviews, making collaboration across teams more efficient than ever.


Secure, Direct Integration


Security and simplicity are at the heart of Interflow Connect. By inputting and authenticating your personal API key—generated from your Interflow settings—the plugin securely identifies your account, organization, and product. This robust authentication process guarantees that your design data is transmitted safely and accurately, offering a streamlined connection between your creative process in Figma and your product management workflow in Interflow.


Empower Your Product Design and Management


Interflow Connect is more than just a plugin—it’s the bridge between your design interface and your management platform. Whether you’re refining your product’s UI, conducting detailed audits, or ensuring that every screen aligns with your design strategy, this plugin is engineered to supercharge your workflow. Enjoy a smoother onboarding process, reduce manual errors, and keep your design projects perfectly synchronized with your product roadmap.


Experience a new level of productivity and collaboration by integrating your design and management tools. With Interflow Connect, you’re not just uploading screens—you’re empowering your team to build better products, faster.
plugins.tagline: The bridge between your interfaces in figma and your interflow.

plugins.name: Clip Clap
plugins.description:
Clip Clap is a Figma plugin created to quickly copy and paste text within your designs.


Features

- Copy Text: Select text layers and copy their content to Figma's clipboard.

- Paste Text: Paste copied text into selected text layers, preserving formatting and styles.

plugins.name: 打印工具 Figma Print Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

Figma Print Pro is a specialized plugin that helps you create print-ready documents directly in Figma. Easily set up standard or custom page sizes, add bleed areas and crop marks, export high-quality PDFs in multiple color formats, and ensure professional results with built-in DPI checks.


Function Description

  1. Custom & Preset Dimensions: Choose from popular print sizes (A4, A3, B5) or enter exact dimensions.
  2. Bleed & Crop Marks: Add bleed lines and crop marks to prepare for professional trimming.
  3. Multi-page Documents: Generate multi-page print layouts all within a single Figma file.
  4. Color Management: Export PDFs in RGB, CMYK, or grayscale for precise color control.
  5. Adjustable Image Quality: Downsample images and set compression levels to optimize file size.
  6. DPI Checks: Analyze frames to confirm whether resolution meets professional print standards.


Usage

  1. Set Up a Document: In the plugin panel, pick a preset size (A4, A3, B5) or enter your custom width and height.
  2. Adjust Settings: Define bleed margins, enable crop marks, and specify the page count.
  3. Preview: The plugin generates a quick visual preview of each page.
  4. Export to PDF: Choose a color format (RGB, CMYK, or grayscale), select image quality settings, then export.
  5. Check DPI: Run the DPI check tool to ensure images and frames meet print-quality standards.


Tips

  1. Recommended DPI: For most print jobs, 300 DPI is standard. Ensure your images and frames meet or exceed this resolution.
  2. Color Consistency: When using CMYK, note that colors may differ slightly from on-screen previews.
  3. Bleed Setup: If your printer requires a bleed, confirm the exact measurement specifications with your print provider.
  4. Downsampling: Keep an eye on image clarity if you significantly reduce the DPI to minimize file size.


介绍

Figma Print Pro 是一款专为在 Figma 中直接创建印刷文档的插件。它支持自定义或常见的标准纸张尺寸，允许添加出血线和裁切线，支持导出多种颜色格式的高质量 PDF，并可进行 DPI 检查，帮助您轻松获得专业的印刷效果。


功能说明

  1. 自定义与预设尺寸：可使用常见的印刷尺寸（A4、A3、B5）或自行输入宽高。
  2. 出血线与裁切线：可配置出血线并添加裁切线，满足专业印刷需求。
  3. 多页文档：在单个 Figma 文件中快速生成多页的打印版面。
  4. 颜色管理：支持 RGB、CMYK 以及灰度输出，便于精确控制印刷颜色。
  5. 可调节图像质量：支持图像降采样并可设置压缩比，实现更小文件体积。
  6. DPI 检查：可检查 Frame 分辨率，判断是否符合专业印刷要求。


使用方法

  1. 文档设置：在插件面板中，选择 A4、A3、B5 等预设尺寸，或手动输入自定义宽高。
  2. 参数调整：设定出血值、是否添加裁切线，以及需要的页面数量。
  3. 预览页面：插件会生成每页的预览，方便快速查看效果。
  4. 导出 PDF：选择颜色模式（RGB、CMYK 或灰度），根据需求调整图像质量后即可导出。
  5. 检查 DPI：使用 DPI 检查功能，确保图像或 Frame 的分辨率达到了可印刷的标准。


注意事项

  1. 建议 DPI：一般印刷要求 300 DPI，确保图像及画框分辨率符合或高于该标准。
  2. 颜色差异：使用 CMYK 模式时，实际印刷颜色可能与屏幕上显示的略有偏差。
  3. 出血线设置：如印刷厂有特殊要求，请提前确认所需的出血值。
  4. 图像降采样：若大幅降低分辨率以减小文件体积，需注意图像清晰度的影响。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Streamline print creation & DPI checks in Figma

plugins.name: Text Size Gradient
plugins.description:
選択したテキストを指定した比率で1文字ずつ拡大／縮小します。


Scales each character in the selected text one by one based on the specified ratio.


How to Use


  1. Select the text you want to edit.
  2. Run the plugin and enter the scaling ratio (%) for enlarging or reducing the text.
  3. Click the OK button to apply the changes.
plugins.tagline: Scales each character in the selected text one by one based on the specified ratio.

plugins.name: CSV to Table in Figma
plugins.description:
Transform your data into editable tables directly within Figma with the CSV to Table plugin. This plugin allows you to easily import and visualize your data in a structured format. Perfect for designers who need to incorporate data tables into their wireframes without the hassle of manual entry.


Key Features:


• Easy Import: Upload CSV files to automatically generate tables.

• Customizable Layouts: Define the number of rows and columns, and customize cell dimensions.

• Drag and Drop: Convenient drag-and-drop functionality for file uploads.

• Data Visualization: Instantly convert raw data into a clean, editable table format.

• Integration: Seamlessly works within Figma to enhance your design workflow.


Say goodbye to tedious data entry and hello to efficient data visualization. Enhance your Figma projects with structured tables in just a few clicks!

plugins.name: QuikA11y
plugins.description:
Make accessibility seamless. Reference with confidence.


Good design requires understanding accessibility, and you want your design decisions to feel informed. While many accessibility tools exist, they don't focus on educating teams about key standards and guidelines. That's the gap QuikA11y fills — making accessibility education effortless, quick, and easy to find.


QuikA11y is a plugin that focuses on educating accessibility standards. Discover instant access to WCAG 2.2 guidelines and empower your design process with expert knowledge and educational insights.


Features:

  1. Quick search on WCAG 2.2 guidelines
  2. Reference all WCAG 2.2 standards and success criteria
  3. Key links to essential WCAG documents and resources
  4. Share accessibility rationales with your team
  5. Place reference notes directly in your designs
  6. Educate and build accessibility awareness
  7. Light and Dark theme to match your preference
  8. Native Figma look and feel

accepted.name: Alex Vong
accepted.description: Hi, I'm Alex;✌️ I'm a designer and front-end developer passionate about crafting beautiful and delightful user interactions through modern web technology.

plugins.tagline: Make accessibility seamless. Reference with confidence.

•Automatically generates frames for all characters (A-Z, a-z, 0-9, symbols)

•Draw your glyphs directly in Figma using any design tool

•Built-in alignment guides for typographic consistency

•Visibility controls to organize your workspace

•Direct export to professional TTF format

2•Design your glyphs inside the frames using shapes, pen tool, or imported SVGs

4•Download your ready-to-install TTF font


🔧 Perfect for:

•Graphic designers creating original typefaces

•Rapid prototyping of typographic concepts

•Educational projects and creative experimentation


Start creating your custom typography today!

plugins.name: Logger
plugins.description:
Logger is a Figma plugin designed to help users log changes made to pages and frames within their Figma projects. The plugin provides an easy-to-use interface with two tabs: "Page log" and "Frame log".


Features

Page Log Tab:

  1. A text area box with the placeholder "Describe the change" where users can enter the change made to the page (mandatory field).
  2. A smaller text box with the placeholder "Change requested by" where users can enter the name of the person who requested the change (optional field).
  3. A "Log change" button that is enabled only when the mandatory fields are filled.

Frame Log Tab:

  1. A drop-down menu with the default value "Select frame" that shows the list of frames on the current page. Users can also select a frame directly on the page, and the frame name will be populated in the drop-down (mandatory field).
  2. A text area box with the placeholder "Describe the change" where users can enter the change made to the frame (mandatory field).
  3. A smaller text box with the placeholder "Change requested by" where users can enter the name of the person who requested the change (optional field).
  4. A "Log change" button that is enabled only when the mandatory fields are filled.


Usage Instructions

Page Log:

  1. Navigate to the "Page log" tab.
  2. Enter the description of the change in the "Describe the change" text area.
  3. (Optional) Enter the name of the person who requested the change in the "Change requested by" text box.
  4. Click the "Log change" button (enabled only when the mandatory fields are filled).

Frame Log:

  1. Navigate to the "Frame log" tab.
  2. Select a frame from the "Select frame" drop-down menu or directly select a frame on the page.
  3. Enter the description of the change in the "Describe the change" text area.
  4. (Optional) Enter the name of the person who requested the change in the "Change requested by" text box.
  5. Click the "Log change" button (enabled only when the mandatory fields are filled).


Logic

Page Log:

  1. When the user clicks the "Log change" button, the plugin checks if there is a page named "Change log" in Figma. If not, it creates one.
  2. The plugin then creates a text field with the name of the page for which the log is created within the "Change log" page and adds the following values: Date and time of the log, User's name requesting the change, Change description
  3. If the page and text already exist, the plugin appends the new values to the existing text.

Frame Log:

  1. When the user clicks the "Log change" button, the plugin checks if there is a text field on the frame with the name "Frame log". If not, it creates the text field within the selected frame (top left corner) and adds the following values:
  2. Date and time of the log
  3. User's name requesting the change
  4. Change description
  5. If the text field already exists, the plugin appends the new values to the existing text within the frame.


Conclusion

Logger is a powerful plugin for tracking changes in Figma projects, making it easier to manage and document modifications to pages and frames. With its intuitive interface and robust logging capabilities, Logger is an essential plugin for any Figma user.
plugins.tagline: A simple native plugin helping designers log their changes both at page as well as frame level.

plugins.name: FigJam Planning Card Creator
plugins.description:
Add structured planning cards to your FigJam boards for agile planning and project management. This plugin helps teams quickly create consistent planning cards with fields like objectives, dependencies, requirements, and time estimates.


Key features:

  1. Import multiple cards at once using YAML or JSON format
  2. Create custom cards with structured fields (title, objective, dependencies, requirements, estimated lift, dates)
  3. Smart placement options - add cards inside sections or below any selection
  4. Pre-formatted cards with proper styling and typography
  5. Great for setting up sprint planning, backlog grooming, and project roadmapping


Works with sections and sticky notes. Select where you want cards and choose from built-in templates, create custom cards, or paste card definitions to bulk import.


📄 YAML/JSON Templates & Examples

📖 Documentation

🏢 Made by Prelude
plugins.tagline: Create structured planning cards for agile workflows using templates or bulk import

plugins.name: Image Converter

This plugin allows you to convert your design images into one of the following formats:

  2. Convert image to PNG,
  3. Convert image to JPEG, or
  4. Convert image to a link format for a smoother workflow.


💬 Any feedbacks and questions are welcome at designer.oladipupo@gmail.com


↘️ Step-by-step Guide

1. Add an image to Figma.

plugins.name: Chat IO
plugins.description:
AI-Powered Chat Interface

- Interactive AI Assistant : Chat with an AI that analyzes your selected Figma content (text layers, frames, components)

- Context-Aware Responses : The AI understands your selected design elements and provides relevant feedback

- Multi-language Support : Automatically detects and responds in the user's language

- Conversation Memory : Maintains context between messages for coherent discussions


Smart Text Replacement System

- AI-Driven Content Generation : Replace selected text layers with AI-generated content based on custom instructions

- Multiple Layer Support : Handle single or multiple text layers simultaneously

- Pre-built Templates : Quick-access buttons for common tasks:

- Summarize : Condense text content concisely

- Improve Text : Enhance clarity, reduce repetition, fix sentence structure

- Improve CTA : Optimize call-to-action buttons following UX best practices

- Task Generator : Convert project descriptions into actionable to-do lists


Generate Task Flow

- Automatic annotation generation: Analyzes the selected frames in Figma and generates descriptive annotations for each one.

- A relevant title for each frame. A concise description that explains the purpose of the frame Interactive element marking:

- Automatically identifies all elements with prototype interactions within the selected frames.
plugins.tagline: AI-powered Figma plugin for intelligent content generation and design feedback using LLM API.

plugins.name: Elemental
plugins.description:
Elemental lets you export images and copy color and shadow values in a single click—no need to set a layer to export, or break a color style to see the hex value. Elemental is built for those quick one-off moments when a developer needs an asset or another app is asking for your primary brand color.


What it does:

  1. Export one or more layers as images in your desired file type and size
  2. Copy the fill color of a layer to clipboard in your desired value type
  3. Copy the stroke color of a layer to clipboard in your desired value type
  4. Copy a layer's shadows in css format


How it works:

  1. Keep your Elemental panel handy
  2. Select a layer
  3. Click your desired export or copy button
plugins.tagline: Snag basic assets in a flash

136742.description:

Transform your design into clean, usable code in minutes — no manual handoff, no guesswork.

plugins.tagline: From Figma to code — smart, fast, and AI-ready.

plugins.name: Extractor
plugins.description:
Components as you go.


As you design, systems, patterns, and components naturally emerge. With Extractor, you can select your working frames, instantly extract them to a component, and automatically replace the original selection with a component instance.


This approach lets you focus on the details while future-proofing designs and aligning process more closely with development.


Simply select your frames and access the "Extractor" command using CMD + P.


Feedback Form ->
plugins.tagline: Components as you go

139148.name: Extractor
139148.description:
Components as you go.


As you design, systems, patterns, and components naturally emerge. With Extractor, you can select your working frames, instantly extract them to a component, and automatically replace the original selection with a component instance.


This approach lets you focus on the details while future-proofing designs and aligning process more closely with development.


Simply select your frames and access the "Extractor" command using CMD + P.


Feedback Form ->

plugins.name: CSV text replace
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、Figma上のテキストレイヤーをCSVを使って効率的に一括置換・エクスポートできるツールです。

Figmaでのテキスト管理が多いプロジェクトや翻訳ワークフローに最適なプラグインです。


【主な機能】

①テキストの一括置換

CSVファイルにA列＝検索対象、B列＝置換内容を記述し、プラグインに読み込ませるだけで、Figma内の該当テキストを自動的に置き換えます。


②テキストのエクスポート

選択したフレームやテキストレイヤー内の文字列をCSV形式で書き出し。翻訳や編集作業との連携に最適です。


【使い方】

プラグイン起動後、

「リプレイス」タブでCSVファイルをアップロードし置換を実行

「エクスポート」タブでは、選択中のテキストをCSVでダウンロード可能

フレームを選択した状態では、そのフレームに含まれる全てのテキストレイヤーを一括でCSV化してダウンロードします


----


This plugin allows you to bulk replace and export text layers in Figma using CSV files—perfect for efficient content updates and translation workflows.

Highly useful for localization, bulk edits, or working with external editors.


[Key Features]

①Bulk Replace Text

Simply upload a CSV file where column A = target text and column B = replacement text. The plugin will find and replace matching text layers in your Figma file.


②Export Text

Export text content from selected frames or layers into a CSV file. Ideal for translation or review processes.


[How to Use]

Open the plugin and go to the “Replace” tab to upload your CSV and execute replacement.

Use the “Export” tab to download the text from selected layers as a CSV file.

When a frame is selected, all text layers within that frame will be exported together as a CSV file.
plugins.tagline: Replace and export text layers in Figma via CSV. CSVでテキストを一括置換＆エクスポート。

フレームを選択した状態では、そのフレームに含まれる全てのテキストレイヤーを一括でCSV化してダウンロードします


----

[Key Features]

plugins.name: Panto: Rename Variables in a Snap!
plugins.description: Tired of manually renaming variable prefixes one by one? Panto is here to streamline your workflow! This powerful yet simple plugin allows you to batch rename the initial segment of your Figma variable names.
plugins.tagline: Batch Rename Variables, Simplified

134630.name: Panto: Rename Variables in a Snap!
134630.description: Tired of manually renaming variable prefixes one by one? Panto is here to streamline your workflow! This powerful yet simple plugin allows you to batch rename the initial segment of your Figma variable names.

plugins.name: Section Distributor
plugins.description:
Section Distributor is a Figma plugin that instantly organizes your Section elements into a clean, vertical stack. Simply select your sections, enter a custom spacing value, and click “Distribute” to move the first section to 0×0 and cascade all others below it at precisely that interval.


Eliminate manual nudging and pixel-perfect alignment headaches—keep your wireframes, design systems, documentation pages, and style guides consistently laid out in seconds.
plugins.tagline: Auto-stack your sections starting at 0,0 with perfect, customizable spacing—one click and done.

134431.name: Section Distributor
134431.description:
Section Distributor is a Figma plugin that instantly organizes your Section elements into a clean, vertical stack. Simply select your sections, enter a custom spacing value, and click “Distribute” to move the first section to 0×0 and cascade all others below it at precisely that interval.


Eliminate manual nudging and pixel-perfect alignment headaches—keep your wireframes, design systems, documentation pages, and style guides consistently laid out in seconds.
134431.tagline: Auto-stack your sections starting at 0,0 with perfect, customizable spacing—one click and done.

plugins.name: Tokenize Your Design
plugins.description:
Tokenize Your Design helps you bring consistency and scalability to your Figma files by automatically replacing static colors with matching token values from your design system.


✅ Key features:

•Scan your entire design file to detect non-token colors

•Match them with the color tokens from your local design system

•Maintain consistent styling across large-scale designs


Perfect for design system maintainers, developers and teams aiming to scale design efficiently.
plugins.tagline: Bring consistency to your design by mapping colors to design system tokens.

133450.name: Tokenize Your Design
133450.description:
Tokenize Your Design helps you bring consistency and scalability to your Figma files by automatically replacing static colors with matching token values from your design system.


✅ Key features:

•Scan your entire design file to detect non-token colors

•Match them with the color tokens from your local design system

•Maintain consistent styling across large-scale designs


Perfect for design system maintainers, developers and teams aiming to scale design efficiently.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin may need to access resources from any domain for maximum flexibility during development and for future integrations.

133450.release_notes: In this version, the stroke colors will also be updated along with the fill color tokens.
133450.tagline: Bring consistency to your design by mapping colors to design system tokens.

plugins.name: Hotkey
plugins.description:
Hotkey lets you control Figma layouts entirely from your keyboard using simple shortcuts. Quickly move, resize, and adjust constraints without opening any panels. Chain commands for efficient workflows. Designed for speed and minimal distraction. Works on selected layers; some features depend on Figma’s API limits.


Read the Docs here: https://navaneethvenu.notion.site/Hotkey-Plugin-1f4ef6c3905a80349201f06119dfeb04?pvs=4


If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.
plugins.tagline: Hotkey is a keyboard-first Figma plugin for fast layout control using shortcuts and commands.

135952.name: Hotkey
135952.description:
Hotkey lets you control Figma layouts entirely from your keyboard using simple shortcuts. Quickly move, resize, and adjust constraints without opening any panels. Chain commands for efficient workflows. Designed for speed and minimal distraction. Works on selected layers; some features depend on Figma’s API limits.


Read the Docs here: https://navaneethvenu.notion.site/Hotkey-Plugin-1f4ef6c3905a80349201f06119dfeb04?pvs=4


If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.
135952.release_notes:
Commands:
1. New Increase/Decrease Width & Height Commands: Use +h, -h, +w, and -w to dynamically adjust height and width values relative to current dimensions.

Other Changes:
1. Added support for + and - prefixes in command parsing (e.g., +h12, -w8) and updated internal regex handling accordingly.
135952.tagline: Hotkey is a keyboard-first Figma plugin for fast layout control using shortcuts and commands.

plugins.name: Find Elements
plugins.description:
Using this tool, we can find any Text Nodes having phrase 'Lorem' i.e. dummy text across the entire page. Then we can find any Text Nodes which do not match the font parameters i.e. Font Family, Style and Size. Finally, we can also find all nodes not matching the color given in hex values.

This is tool is helpful to find mis-matched items based on the given parameters.
plugins.tagline: Find text having 'Lorem', find text with non-matching font and find items with non-matching colors

135964.name: Find Elements
135964.description:

This is tool is helpful to find mis-matched items based on the given parameters.
135964.tagline: Find text having 'Lorem', find text with non-matching font and find items with non-matching colors

plugins.name: Agiliza copy HTML v2.0
plugins.description:
Transforme textos do Figma em blocos HTML com tags como <b>, <i> e <gradiente> automaticamente aplicadas de acordo com os estilos da camada.

Ideal para uso com Elementor, Webflow ou páginas de alta performance.

Também permite exportar diretamente a seleção como imagem WebP (otimizada) ou SVG vetorial.


Funciona 100% dentro do Figma, sem dependências externas.
plugins.tagline: Converta textos em HTML com tags visuais e exporte como WebP ou SVG

138918.name: Agiliza copy HTML v2.0
138918.description:
Transforme textos do Figma em blocos HTML com tags como <b>, <i> e <gradiente> automaticamente aplicadas de acordo com os estilos da camada.

Ideal para uso com Elementor, Webflow ou páginas de alta performance.

Também permite exportar diretamente a seleção como imagem WebP (otimizada) ou SVG vetorial.


Funciona 100% dentro do Figma, sem dependências externas.
138918.release_notes: Correção de bug na exportação por slices e botao ativo visualmente corrigido
138918.tagline: Converta textos em HTML com tags visuais e exporte como WebP ou SVG
